thread.title: Calvin Harris – “Heatstroke” (Feat. Young Thug, Pharrell Williams, & Ariana Grande)
thread.title_full: Calvin Harris – “Heatstroke” (Feat. Young Thug, Pharrell Williams, & Ariana Grande)

author: Chris DeVille
title: Calvin Harris – “Heatstroke” (Feat. Young Thug, Pharrell Williams, & Ariana Grande)
text:
Chris DeVille @chrisdeville | March 30, 2017 - 11:18 pm Share < br />this article: 
Calvin Harris gave us a worthy Song Of The Summer candidate with “ Slide ,” a vibrantly funky beach-party anthem that united the Scottish producer with Frank Ocean and Migos. Will posse cut lightning strike twice for Harris? News of “Heatstroke,” his new collaboration with the dream team of Young Thug, Pharrell, and Ariana Grande, suggested that it just might. The song has arrived, and now we all have to ask ourselves whether we’re suddenly big Calvin Harris fans. Listen below.
